TopicTitle: Very slow perfs with more 40 probes on launcher

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.1.2 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Windows 10 | CPU: AMD Ryzen 5 3600x | GPU: Gigabyte RTX 4070 Windforce 12Gb | RAM: DDR4 32Gb

 

I have a performance issue. When I launch several probes with one rocket (40 probes or more), game become extremely slow (9-10fps) and GPU is used only at 40%.
In KSP1, it was possible to send 100 probes without compromising performance too much. 

In KSP2, it is impossible to send Satellite constellation easily. This issue can be reproduce on other computers.

I ask to several friends to send Satellite constellation in one time and performances decrease each times.

 

Edited June 20, 2023 by Anth12

11 hours ago, roic said:

I have a performance issue. When I launch several probes with one rocket (40 probes or more), game become extremely slow (9-10fps) and GPU is used only at 40%.

Yeah that's pretty standard at the moment.

When KSP2 should be working harder it appears to be doing the complete opposite.
